DOC.brief_title: Effect Starter Formula With Synbiotics Stool Microbiota Infants After Normal Caesarean Section Delivery
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective trial : - show difference colonization gastrointestinal tract bacteria Bifidobacterium sp . infant born normal caesarean delivery , feed test control product - investigate whether equivalence growth four different group infant describe . Design : This control , double blind , randomize , multi center , clinical trial 4 group parallel . Two group infant ( bear normal caesarean delivery ) consume one 2 milk formula . Number patient ( enrol / analyze ) : Approximately 450 / 240 Stratification do gender delivery mode . Description subject main criterion inclusion : Healthy full term infant bear HIV positive mother elect feed child exclusively milk formula birth . Children born normal caesarean delivery consider separately .
